item.title: Multiedia content
item.description: Value Add Games is a publishing company specializing in the elopement and publishing of board games. Working for the company, one of my objectives was to create multimedia content for various campaigns. This included: creating promotional material, social media content, presentation videos, product photography, stop-motion videos, enhancing and manipulating images and various other work in this field. Click here to check out their website.

item.title: Rooms in the Rainforest Retreat
item.description: Deep In the heart of west coast glacier country, Rainforest Retreat offers a range of accommodation set amongst lush native bush in the Franz Josef township. From luxury tree huts to backpackers rooms. It was a short project where I took photos of a couple of rooms that ended up on their website and social media.

item.title: New Year in Franz Josef Glacier
item.description: With roaring fires & regular DJ’s, Monsoon bar carries a large range of New Zealand finest beers and wines, while the Monsoon restaurant satisfies hunger whatever the budget with all you can eat pizza nights, bar meals and an à la carte menu. The Great Gatsby themed night and a live DJ was a perfect way to ring in 2020. My job as the official photographer was to capture the spirit of the roaring 20s and make memories for the guests while maintaining the photo booth. Click here to check out the highlihts.

item.title: Videographer at CCIS
item.company: Chamber of Commerce and Industry of Slovenia
item.description: The Chamber of Commerce and Industry of Slovenia is a non-governmental organisation representing the interests of the Slovenian economy. It provides essential services for enterprises operating in Slovenia. For the organisations I produced over 50 videos (presentations and reportages) for various events organised by the chamber. Click here to check out their youtube channel.

item.title: Mladi Pomurci: Ta noč bo najina
item.description: Produced the second official music video for the young volkmusik band of five. The polka “This night will be ours” tells a love story between a young couple caught between the day and the night; the sea and the stars. As the videographer, my job was to record, edit and help with the production of the music video. Click here to check it out.

item.title: Mladi Pomurci: Svet postal bi lep
item.description: The official music video, “World would become a better place” tells a story of band leaders’ uncle and how he spent his life helping and teaching others to help. It tells the story of how already a small act of kindness can produce a sincere smile. My job was to produce, record, edit and help with the story. Click here to check it out.

item.title: Oktoberfest
item.description: The three weeks I spent in München, Germany were absolutely incredible. Festanation is a pop-up hostel where travelers can meet like-minded fun havers such as themselves. This time they pop-upped in the world’s most legendary and biggest beer festival. My job as their official photographer was to capture the heart of the festival and fun memories for our guests. Both of which were shared daily on social media. To check out the highlights, click here. Ein prosit!

item.title: Valeta
item.description: Valeta is a tradition where on the last day of the last year of primary school students perform a dance and look back on the past nine years and the memories they made. For this project I was one of the official photographers. Click here to check out a couple of highlights.

item.title: Funky Disco Soul Pop Party
item.description: Groovocado is one of the healthiest ‘musifruits’ on the planet, as large quantities contain all life-essential nutrients, such as soul, funk, disco, pop, rock’n’roll, and 80’s and 90’s gems. This was my second project for the band; a lively event in one of the smaller bars in the city center. The first concert I shot for them was one year prior to this. Check out the highlights from both events here.

item.title: Iceland 2018
item.description: With two friends, I spend a week and a half in one of the most beautiful places in the world. From ice-cold glaciers and waterfalls that pour over every cliff to rugged landscapes and natural hot springs, Iceland is surely a place where nature reigns supreme. For the trip, Canon Slovenia provided us with Canon's brand-new camera and gear. While travelling, they frequently shared our photos and vlogs on their social media platforms. Click here to check out the first vlog.

item.title: Hochschultage
item.description: Once a year the university opens its doors to the public. The event that spans a couple of days gives the students a chance to show their work to the community. Every class subject organizes a small exhibition and my task for the “Audio / Visuelle Artikulation” (where I also exhibited my work) was to document the event with my camera. Click here to check out a set of highlights.

item.title: Mladi Pomurci: Štorklja jadra čez nebo
item.description: For the second lyric video of the band Mladi Pomurci, the task was to film various landscapes from the Pomurje region and combine them with the indigenous stork that the region is famous for. The aim of the music video was to capture the local spirit. Check out the video here.

item.title: Mladi pomurci: Prlek in prekmurka
item.description: Mladi Pomurci is a volksmusik band of five that work from the Pomurje region in Slovenia. They perform Slovene folk music, Dalmatian and foreign music with the aim of spreading a cheerful spirit among the listeners. This was my first project for the band. The aim was to create a lyric music video for one of their new songs that tells a love story between a boy and a girl that come from different regions separated by a river. Check out the video here.

item.title: Multimedia coordiantor at EESTEC LC Ljubljana
item.description: EESTEC is an international student organization that aims to encourage the exchange of ideas among students through professional workshops, cultural student exchanges and publications. As a member of the said organisation, I took the role of the Multimedia coordinator and produced multiple promotional videos. I also took part as the video coordinator for multiple events and have produced two out of three most viewed videos on their YouTube Channel. Click here to check out one of them.

item.title: Presentation video for Drogart
item.description: The aim was to create a presentation video for Drogart. Drogart is a non-profit organization with the aim of educating and reducing the harmful effects of alcohol and drugs among young people. Check out the video here.

item.title: Na meji nevidnega 2016
item.description: The best way to describe the event would be as a Slovene Comic-con. A convention of fantasy and science fiction. For the 2016 edition, I took the role as the official videographer and produced the aftermovie for the event. Click here to check it out.

item.title: Bytes of Banking 2016
item.description: An international workshop for students, was organized by Halcom in cooperation with EESTEC LC Ljubljana and the Management group association. The selected students from nine different countries searched for innovative solutions that connect loyalty programs with the mobile platform Hal mBills. My role was to document the event with the provided camera and produce an aftermovie. It was my first major project. Click here to check it out.
